mapper.sql: id, name, type, pid, permission, sort, icon, path, visible, target, creator, create_time, updater, update_time, is_delete
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ca_menu
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ca_menu (id, name, type, pid, permission, sort, icon, path, visible, target, creator, create_time, updater, update_time, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visible,jdbcType=BIT}, #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT})
